alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Ritchie; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pleasants, northern Ritchie and northeastern Wood Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Belmont, or 10 miles southwest of St. Marys, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Pennsboro, Belmont, North Bend State Park, Ellenboro, Cairo, Willow Island, Nutter Farm, Maxwell, Petroleum, Schultz, Arvilla, Point Lookout, Mountain, Hebron, Pike and Highland. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 18 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
